goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
indicator_name: Proportion of domestic budget funded by domestic taxes
graph_title: Proportion of domestic budget funded by domestic taxes
goal_name: 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
target_name: 17.1: Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to developing countries, to improve domestic capacity for tax and other revenue collection
indicator_name1: 17.1.2: Proportion of domestic budget funded by domestic taxes
organization_name:
Ministry of Finance of the Kyrgyz Republic (State Revenue Forecasting Department);
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Finance Statistics Unit)
organization_website:
MF KR: www.minfin.kg; 
NSC KR: www.stat.kg
definitions: Tax burden: revenues as taxes determined in accordance with the Government Finance Statistics Code (GFS) 11 as a share of total government revenues.
rationale_interpretation: Tax burden indicates how well tax policy meets one of its main objectives, a fair increase in the revenues required for the state governance.
data_sources: Data on state revenues is an administrative data of the Central Treasury of the Ministry of Finance of the Kyrgyz Republic based on reports on the state, national and local budgets’ implementation.
data_collection: The Central Committee of the MoF KR submits reports on the state, national and local budgets’ implementation to the NSC KR on a monthly and annual basis.
computation_methods: Calculated as the ratio of tax revenues according to budget implementation reporting to total revenues (in percentage terms)
quality_assurance: The best possible comparable data between the countries can be achieved using the RSGF 2014 classification.
data_availability_gaps: Data on the indicator are available in the annual dynamics since 2007, available at the website of the National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic, Open Data and Statistics/Sustainable Development Goals Sections.
disaggregation: The data on indicator are provided as a country statistics for the Kyrgyz Republic.
international_comparability: State revenues in total and by type of revenue - in accordance with the 2001 IMF Manual on Government Finance Statistics Manual, including revenues from the sale of non-financial assets.
